name: Strip Music Box
description:
Strip music box is the music game which has a strip of paper that passes through and the little holes in this strip determine the tune.
These little holes can be played with the KEYPAD, the TRACKPAD or both at the same time. There are now 6 songs(Inc. Canon in D). Each song comes with 3 strips for you to play different parts separately or to play all together.
You can even play & record your own music and share it with your friends.

Features:
・ 3 Ways to Play: 9 Keypad mode, Trackpad mode, 8 Keypad + Trackpad.
・ Record & Share: Record your song play and share the videos to Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, and via email.
・ 20+ Playable Instruments: Bells, drum, piano, synth, voices, bass and more...
・ 18 Strips To Play: From beginners' strips to experts' strips.
・ Gamecenter Leaderboards: Compare your high scores with the competition.
